item.title: Report X-2024041321
item.description:
Report X-2024041321

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-01T15:11:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-22
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY, USA CBP IMPORT OFFICIALS STOPPED A PACKAGE FROM TAIWAN FOR INSPECTION. THE INVOICE AND THERMAL TRACKING LABEL DESCRIBE THE CONTENTS AS STORAGE BOTTLES. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TEN INNER BOXES DESCRIBING CONTENTS AS KING GUARD SELF-DEFENSIVE BODY PROTECT AEROSOL TYPE AND CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE. CONTENT INSPECTION OF THESE INNER BOXES REVEALS A TOTAL OF 100 AEROSOL CANS OF SELF DEFENSE KEYCHAIN-STYLE PEPPER SPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024041241
item.description:
Report X-2024041241

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-30T18:16:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-16
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: BOTTOM OF PACKAGE BURST OPEN, REVEALING HAZARDOUS MATERIALS INSIDE (THAT WERE PACKAGED IN ORIGINAL INTERNAL PACKAGING). CHEMICAL UNDER PRESSURE, N.O.S., (HYDROFLUOROOLEFIN NITROGEN) INNER BOX MARKED AND LABELED WITH HAZMAT SHIPPING PAPERS, PSN AND DOT LABELS; NET WEIGHT OF CYLINDER 29.3 LBS AND GROSS WEIGHT 40.2 LBS. PACKAGE WEIGHT ON THERMAL STATES 41 LBS. THE ACTUAL PACKAGE WEIGHT IS 82 LBS.

item.title: Report E-2024040614
item.description:
Report E-2024040614

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-30T18:16:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: BOWLING GREEN
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG LEASING, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During the course of delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank, the connection between the delivery hose and pump became compromised. This caused approximately 25 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. Hull's Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
